Pro Tip: A 1% variance in pool margin is roughly .05% impact on the delegator’s ROS.   Ex. Two pools w/ the same values except margin: 1% & 5%  is a variance of .25% impact on ROS.  Not insignificant but IMO more value is in finding a pool providing a consistent ROS #ADA #Cardano
